creator: Education Media
descriptionHtml:
We are one of the best commerce Coaching institute in Kota. We are known for creating best result in 11th and 12th and giving selections in the best colleges of India like SRCC. Coaching programs at Commerce Mantra Kota, are meant for students who aspire to score higher marks and achieve desired results in the Commerce stream. Generally, our courses do not have more than 30 to 40 students in one class, allowing teachers to pay attention to individual students.

Our faculties have an expertise of more then 19 years in dealing in their respective subjects. We have professionally qualified faculties who possess NATIONAL and INTERNATIONAL teaching experience.
We do provide distance learning education through live and pre-recorded videos.


Become a leader and topper by joining one of the best commerce coaching institute in Kota i.e. COMMERCE MANTRA.
This premier institution, more than 20 years in existence, has been at the service of the youth of JAIPUR and its environs, as an educational institution run by COMMERCE MANTRA, for the education, formation and professional preparation of young people of all castes, creeds and communities without any discrimination. And as an institution it places a special accent on preferential option for the poor. We have successfully established in the city of KOTA now.

Our mission is to develop young men with active and creative minds, a sense of understanding and compassion for others, and the courage to act on their beliefs. We stress the total development of each child: spiritual, moral, intellectual, social, emotional, and physical. COMMERCE MANTRA recognizes that each child is an individual; that all children are creative; that all children need to succeed. Therefore, COMMERCE MANTRA respects the individual needs of children; fosters a caring and creative environment; and emphasizes the social, emotional, physical, intellectual development of each child. The mission of the of our institution is to guarantee the superior preparation and performance of every child in school and in life.


“We try to create a world & a planet through education"

“ Be curious always, for knowledge will not acquire it” every creature on earth has been tutored in the art of living by parents or planetary circumstances. We humans are the only ones capable of analyzing the present and then systematically affecting our future. We need to make our presence felt in the years to come and gear up for the challenges of the future. This we must do by becoming more inclusive, more futuristic in our approach.


Education is becoming one of the largest organized sector across the world. With the buoyant Indian economy, educational institutions are playing a major role in shaping it up by providing trained resources for industry. While there are very few institutions which can boast up. COMMERCE MANTRA has been known for its pioneering efforts in this field of education.
